name: Green Way Labs, Inc.
description: Owner and developer of non-toxic, eco-friendly cleaning products intended to create a cleaning formula that would meet the green standards. The company's products utilize advanced colloidal chemistry featuring renewable plant-based components to develop a non-toxic, non-solvent-based cleaning solution that can remove oils, greases, including asphalt roofing tars and sealants, enabling users to get a product that is safe for skin and all surfaces at a low cost.
one_liner: Owner and developer of non-toxic, eco-friendly cleaning products intended to create a cleaning formula that would meet the green standards. The company's products utilize advanced colloidal chemistry featuring renewable plant-based components to develop a non-toxic, non-solvent-based cleaning solution that can remove oils, greases, including asphalt roofing tars and sealants, enabling users to get a product that is safe for skin and all surfaces at a low cost.
